content.description: Start low on the rightside of cave. Hand Holds start on the small crystals on the lip. There are a few options for feet all are good depending on height.  Party trick problem of mantling up on the the face and then its easy crystal pulling to the top. Did this problem recently again if you can move quick through the bottom the top is easy.
content.location: Right side of the cave when looking directly into it.

content.description: This boulder is leaning against the base of Turtle Dome's North side (the side you approach from). There is one established problem and one very hard futuristic project that probably is one of the hardest in the Hills. It could probably go from some crazy strong mutant climber. I have done some moves starting from the chalked crimps above your head to the left when viewing. Out right almost making it to the lip. Its very powerful! The low start into this is going to take a lot. The feet are there and it's just figuring out one/two hand holds that don't exist to connect the lower portion into the upper portion. I believe this line will be a classic proud line if it ever gets complete. Hirsch? Ross? Terveen?
